body.name: LOVEVOOK Laptop Bags for Women, 15.6 inch Waterproof Work Tote Bag with Clutch, Professional Teacher College Computer Purse Lightweight Shoulder Bag Travel, Quilted Black
features: Superior Storage & Smart Organization: This elegantly designed laptop bag for women (Size: 12" x 16" x 5.6") offers ample space for all essentials. Its compartments are tailor-made for A4 documents, folders, a 15.6" laptop, and a 13-inch tablet, each protected by sturdy padding. The laptop tote bag's smart internal layout, including a keychain holder and specialized pockets for water bottles and umbrellas, ensures that every item has its place.

Laptop Tote with Versatile Pouch: Elevate your organization game with the included versatile pouch, designed to secure your tech accessories like cables and chargers. Work tote bag of adaptability makes it perfect for storing small essentials like business cards, stationery, and headphones, keeping them within easy reach.

Adaptable for Any Setting: Crafted for convenience, this laptop tote bag seamlessly transitions from a professional work bags for women to casual shooping bag or teacher bag. Laptop purse of detachable and adjustable shoulder strap offers comfort and style, ensuring you carry your essentials with ease, no matter the destination.

Fashion Meets Functionality: Expertly crafted with sophisticated embroidery on high-quality waterproof polyesterand PU fabric, this laptop tote bag for women stands out in terms of both durability and style. Its reinforced base and side padding not only provide added protection but also help maintain the laptop bag's shape, preventing any spills. Additionally, the inclusion of protective studs on the base guards against dirt and wear, preserving the bag’s pristine condition.

The Quintessential Gift: LOVEVOOK laptop bag for women blend of elegance, utility, and versatility makes it a cherished accessory for any modern woman’s lifestyle. Whether it’s a gesture for a career-driven professional such as teacher, a diligent college or a style-conscious women, this laptop bag is an impeccable gift choice for Women.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.8 4.8 out of 5 stars 33 ratings 4.8 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose a polyester mixed with PU material design for the laptop bag? The polyester mixed with PU design combines the durability of polyester with the elegance of PU material. The polyester offers sturdy and durable support, while the PU adds a glossy, upscale look, ensuring the bag is both practical and fashionable. How should I clean and maintain the polyester mixed with PU laptop bag? For the polyester part, gently wipe with a damp cloth, avoiding excessive moisture. For the PU sections, it's best to lightly wipe with a clean, dry cloth. Avoid using harsh chemical cleaners to prevent damage to the materials. What should I do if the polyester sides have wrinkles from long transportation? For wrinkles caused during transportation, a simple solution is to use steam ironing. Gently iron over the polyester part with a steam iron, ensure the temperature is not too high and avoid direct contact with the PU areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large and sturdy bag
reviews.reviewText: This bag is great for work (and probably school). It functions as a briefcase and laptop bag but is stylish like a purse. The strap is sturdy and convenient. Someone did mention that the zipper can get hung on when going over the edge of the purse and it does, so you need to pull the end of the zipper taught so that the whole piece is flat and then it'll zip just fine. For me this isn't an issue, but if you're often in a situation where you need to close or open it one handed then this would be a problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bag for school. It's comfy and beautiful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and useful
reviews.reviewText: This laptop tote set is super cute! It’s the perfect size for toting around your laptop and the rest of your daily essentials. There’s a padded pocket for both your laptop and your tablet, and two side pockets to hold your water bottles standing up. You can carry it with the short straps over your arm or shoulder, or use the detachable padded shoulder strap to carry it more like a messenger bag or crossbody. The gold hardware adds a classy touch to the bag, and it even has metal feet on the bottom to protect the bottom of the bag from rough or dirty surfaces. I like the little matching storage pouch that comes with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and great quality
reviews.reviewText: I use this bag for college, and it really does do its job. Not only is the quilting so cute, but the bag's material is sturdy and not cheap.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and very well packaged
reviews.reviewText: Just got the bag haven’t officially used it but from first glance it’s very good quality and seems to be durable. I will be using this bag for work; so far I’m very pleased with this purchase excited to put it to use. I will come back to edit or give another review after a couple months of using it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the color,the style and how I look carrying it!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Only for slimline 17" laptops, doesn't fit thicker versions
reviews.reviewText: High quality bag with sturdy feeling handles and it stands up by itself without flopping over. The pockets on the inside are well thought out. The inner pockets on each end can hold an insulated water bottle, power brick, or USB power bank are especially helpful - keeping those heavier items upright and contained is great. I was planning to use this as a laptop bag, but had to repurpose it for a teaching bag. It holds a standard D ring 1" binder easily in the laptop area and I can use the smaller, tablet area for other smaller materials.Deducting 1 star because my 17" laptop does not fit. The total width is ok, but my laptop is a slightly older workhorse and it is just over 1" thick. The thickness prohibits it from slipping into the laptop pocket. If your laptop is thinner, I would highly recommend this bag. The shoulder strap, accessory bag, and dust cover all add to the high-end functionality of this bag.

reviews.reviewText: This bag is huge and convientThe cup holders make it and the waterproofing is just a bonus purchased for me and my bestie thats a new mom!!Fucntions amazing, durability is great!
